no-quest-available-desc: I currently don't need your help with anything.
no-quest-active-desc: I don't remember having any open contracts with you.
quest-gather20MeatFor8FlaxSeeds-title: There is no protein in flax fibre
quest-gather20MeatFor8FlaxSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 20 meat of any kind, I could offer you 8 flax seeds in return.
quest-gather20MeatFor8ParsnipSeeds-title: There is no protein in parsnips
quest-gather20MeatFor8ParsnipSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 20 meat of any kind, I could offer you 8 parsnip seeds in return.
quest-gather20MeatFor8TurnipSeeds-title: There is no protein in turnip fibre
quest-gather20MeatFor8TurnipSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 20 meat of any kind, I could offer you 8 turnip seeds in return.
quest-kill15DriftersFor3Gears-desc: The woods simply aren't safe anymore. Drifters are everywhere. If you could clear the surrounding area by killing 15 drifters, we could pay you a fair price.
quest-kill3NightmareDriftersFor5Gears-ti: The growling from the unspeakable depths
quest-kill3NightmareDriftersFor5Gears-de: We can no longer extract minerals from the mountains because of the creatures that lurk in the caves deep down below. We would be willing to pay a generous price for anyone helping to clear the depths by killing 3 nightmare drifters.
